<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fang Sharpener](/Feats.aspx?ID=1000) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 37 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Irongut Goblin](/Heritages.aspx?ID=17) heritage or [Razortooth Goblin](/Heritages.aspx?ID=18) heritage

</column>

---

You have filed your teeth into jagged points and have an unusually powerful jaw, making your mouth a dangerous weapon. If you’re an irongut goblin, you gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1d4 piercing damage, and if you’re a razortooth goblin, your jaws unarmed attack deals 1d8 piercing damage and loses the finesse trait. Whenever you score a critical hit with your jaws unarmed attack, your target takes 1 [persistent](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) bleed damage per weapon damage die.

<title level="2">Fang Sharpener leads to...</title>
[Ankle Bite](/Feats.aspx?ID=1002), [Hungry Goblin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1008)
name: Fang Sharpener
prerequisite: Irongut Goblin heritage or Razortooth Goblin heritage
